sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import TicketCard from '../components/TicketCard'; import StatCard from '../components/StatCard'; import QuickActionCard from '../components/QuickActionCard'; import UserManagement from '../components/Admin/UserManagement'; import TicketManagement from '../components/Admin/TicketManagement'; import SystemAnalytics from '../components/Admin/SystemAnalytics'; import SystemSettings from '../components/Admin/SystemSettings'; import ticketService from '../services/ticketService'; import userService from '../services/userService'; import '../styles/Dashboard.css'; import '../styles/AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [dashboardData, setDashboardData] = useState({}); const [recentTickets, setRecentTickets] = useState([]); const [systemStats, setSystemStats] = useState({}); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const [userStats, setUserStats] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardData(); }, []); const fetchDashboardData = async () => { try { const [ticketsResponse, userStatsResponse, systemStatsResponse] = await Promise.all([ ticketService.getTickets({ limit: 6, sortBy: 'updatedAt', sortOrder: 'desc' }), userService.getUserStats(), userService.getSystemStats() ]); setRecentTickets(ticketsResponse.tickets); setUserStats(userStatsResponse); setSystemStats(systemStatsResponse); setDashboardData({ ...userStatsResponse, ...systemStatsResponse }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; // Admin-specific quick actions const adminQuickActions = [ { label: 'User Management', description: 'Manage all user accounts', icon: 'üë•', path: '#', color: 'primary', emergency: false, action: () => setActiveTab('users') }, { label: 'System Analytics', description: 'View detailed reports', icon: 'üìä', path: '#', color: 'info', emergency: false, action: () => setActiveTab('analytics') }, { label: 'Ticket Management', description: 'Manage all support tickets', icon: 'üé´', path: '#', color: 'warning', emergency: false, action: () => setActiveTab('tickets') }, { label: 'System Settings', description: 'Configure system', icon: '‚öôÔ∏è', path: '#', color: 'secondary', emergency: false, action: () => setActiveTab('settings') } ]; const emergencyActions = [ { label: 'Critical System Alert', description: 'System-wide issues', icon: 'üö®', path: '/admin/alerts', color: 'danger', emergency: true }, { label: 'Database Backup', description: 'Create immediate backup', icon: 'üíæ', path: '/admin/backup', color: 'success', emergency: false } ]; const adminTabs = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'System Overview', icon: 'üìä' }, { id: 'users', label: 'User Management', icon: 'üë•' }, { id: 'tickets', label: 'Ticket Management', icon: 'üé´' }, { id: 'analytics', label: 'Analytics & Reports', icon: 'üìà' }, { id: 'settings', label: 'System Settings', icon: '‚öôÔ∏è' } ]; if (loading) { return ( <>

Loading admin dashboard...

); } const renderTabContent = () => { switch (activeTab) { case 'users': return ; case 'tickets': return ; case 'analytics': return ; case 'settings': return ; default: return renderOverview(); } }; const renderOverview = () => ( <> {/* System Health Alert Banner */}
üíö
System Status: Operational All systems running normally ‚Ä¢ Uptime: {systemStats.systemUptime || '99.9%'}
{/* Admin Quick Actions */}

Administrative Actions

{adminQuickActions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
{/* Emergency Admin Actions */}

Emergency Controls

{emergencyActions.map((action, index) => ( ))}
{/* System Overview Stats */}

System Overview

{/* Detailed Statistics Grid */}

User Distribution

Students {userStats.students || 0}
Staff {userStats.staff || 0}
Technicians {userStats.technicians || 0}
Admins {userStats.admins || 0}

Ticket Status

Open {systemStats.openTickets || 0}
In Progress {systemStats.inProgressTickets || 0}
Resolved {systemStats.resolvedTickets || 0}
Closed {systemStats.closedTickets || 0}

System Metrics

Avg Response {dashboardData.avgResponseTime || 2.1}h
SLA Compliance {dashboardData.slaCompliance || 98}%
User Satisfaction {dashboardData.satisfactionRate || 95}%
Database Size 245 MB
{/* Recent System Activity */}

Recent System Activity

View All Logs ‚Üí
{recentTickets.length === 0 ? (
üìã

No Recent Activity

No recent tickets or system activities.

) : ( <>
{recentTickets.map(ticket => ( ))}
Manage All Tickets
)}
{/* System Health Monitoring */}

System Health Monitor

All Systems Normal
API Server
Operational
Database
Connected
Email Service
Active
File Storage
78% Available
{/* Quick User Management */}

Quick User Management

New Users (7d) {userStats.recentUsers || 0}
Pending Verifications {userStats.pendingVerifications || 0}
Suspended Accounts {userStats.suspendedAccounts || 0}
); return ( <>
{/* Admin Header */}

System Administration üõ†Ô∏è

Complete control panel for managing the IT Support System

Super Administrator Full System Access
üíæ Backup System
{/* Admin Navigation Tabs */}
{adminTabs.map(tab => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{renderTabContent()}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
